content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 40}, {"type": "cyan_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 41}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft an end_rod, I first need to craft a popped_chorus_fruit. To craft a popped_chorus_fruit, I need to smelt a chorus_fruit, therefore I will smelt the chorus_fruit at slot 45 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 45 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 40}, {"type": "cyan_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to place a blaze_rod above a popped_chorus_fruit. Therefore, I will move the blaze_rod from slot 22 into slot 1, which is above slot 11.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 40}, {"type": "cyan_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to place a blaze_rod above a popped_chorus_fruit. Therefore, I will move the popped_chorus_fruit from slot 11 into slot 4, which is below slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 40}, {"type": "cyan_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to place a blaze_rod above a popped_chorus_fruit. Therefore, I will move the end_rod from slot 0 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
